data: {"generalSituation":"Under the influence of a strong easterly airstream, it will be cloudier over the coast of Guangdong on New Year's Eve and New Year's Day. A cold front will reach the coastal areas of southern China later on New Year's Day. Under the influence of the associated winter monsoon, winds will strengthen from the north and temperatures will fall appreciably over the region. It will become cold and the weather will improve on Friday and during the weekend. Dry replenishments of the monsoon are expected to persist over Guangdong early to midweek next week. It will remain rather cool in the morning over the region. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251231","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"East force 3 to 4, becoming force 5, occasionally force 6 offshore.","forecastWeather":"Becoming cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning.
